School of Professional Studies Online Degree Programs
School of Professional Studies Online Degree Programs

This page details the online degree programs offered by NYU's School of Professional Studies. There are links to individual degree program pages that include information about those programs' degree requirements, courses, admissions criteria, career outlooks, and financing options. Online programs include an MS in Global Sport, MS in Human Capital Analytics and Technology (STEM), MS in Human Resource Management and Development, MS in Professional Writing, MS in Project Management (STEM), MS in Translation, BA in Social Sciences, and a BS in Leadership and Management Studies.
